Alcunas veguadas son formatz en la mayre un, e dos, e tres, e quatre, e v, e vi, e vii, e mays x, e ja es deves mi verificat que una femna abortem ne getet vi, e una autra x totz formatz, la qual causa fo fayta per mensuracio dels glorios savis.	Some women give birth to one, two, three, four, five, six, seven, and even more than ten, and it is already necessary for me to verify that a woman who has aborted six times, and another who has given birth to all of them, the cause of which is made by the glorious saints.
E tot aysso cove que sia en la sciencia de la matrona quar fort leu ad aquela parve semblant de aquo, e donc opause se ad aquo am so que cove.	And all such knowledge that is in the science of the wise woman, which is very useful for that which resembles it, and therefore she applies herself to that which is useful.
Capitol .lxxvi.	Chapter 76.
De extraccio del fet quan es mort.	On the extraction of the fetus when it is dead.
Quan tu curas le fet mort am aquo que havem dit en la divisio de la medicacio e no es defora eyssit, e tu yest forsat usar de opperacio am ma, lahoras cove que consideras si la femna es de sana vertut e no es am alcu dels accidentz per les quals sobre ela es temuda perdicio.	When you care for the dead fetus, use what we have said in the division of medicine and do not defile it, and you may safely use operation to remove it from her, then consider whether the woman is of sound health and not subject to any of the accidents by which she is feared for loss.
Lahoras cove que la femna sia envessada sobre le lieyt sobre le sieu dos, e sia le cap de lu enclinat enjos e las coyssas de lu sian elevadas.	When the woman is lying on her back, her head should be slightly raised, and her arms and legs should be elevated.
E·l ministre tengua aquela de doas partz o sia liada en le lieyt per so que·l cos de lu no se extenda deves la extraccio del fet.	The nurse should hold the patient's arms or place them flat on the bed to prevent the patient from moving during the extraction of the fetus.
E aprop tu humecta la boca de la mayre de lu am olis humitz e am mucellage de altea e de fenugrec e de semensa de li.	Then, you should moisten the mouth of the woman with oil and a mixture of mint, fennel, and sesame seeds.
E aprop unte la matrona la sua ma am aquels olis e mucellages, e aprop entrometa la sua ma am fecilitat en la mayre, e aprop cerque am la ma loc en le qual fique les uncis en le fet.	Then, the midwife should place her hand on those oils and mixtures, and she should insert her hand into the vagina, and she should feel for the umbilical cord in the fetus.
E locs convenient en aquo: adonc tu considera si le fet es preparat que deysenda sobre le sieu cap, e lahoras tu fique les uncis en les huels de lu, o en le col, o en la boca, o en le palat, o dejos la barba, o en la furcula de lu, o en les locs propdas de las costas, o dejos les ypocondres.	In such cases: then you consider whether the fetus is ready to breathe on its own, and if so, you should find the umbilical cord in the neck, chest, mouth, palate, under the chin, beard, breastbone, or other appropriate locations.
Mays si le deysendiment es sobre les pes de lu, lahoras en le pentenilh, o en le mieg de las costas.	If the inflammation is on his feet, then in the plantar fascia, or in the middle of the ribs.
E cove que tengua le unci am la ma dreyta, e pausa la curvitat de lu en aquel loc le qual es entre les ditz de la ma senestra, e entrometa la ma am facilitat e fique le unci en alcu de aquels locs les quals havem ditz, entro que pervengua a la causa boyda.	And have him hold his hand on the bent part of his arm, place your hand on the curvature of his arm in that place between the elbow and shoulder, and insert your hand with ease and feel the pain in any of those places we have mentioned until you reach the cause of the pain.
E aprop pause e fique en la apposicio de lu un autre unci, o le tertz si es necessitat, per so que sia atraccio engual, e no sia extencio segon la sua rectetut tant solament.	And then place and hold another hand in the position of his arm, or third if necessary, so that it is attached equally, and not extended according to its straightness only.
Ans sia maugut a tota partida, per so que l’eyssiment de lu sia alleujat ayssi cum es fayt en dent deves la eradicacio de lu.	And let your hand be at all parts, so that the pressure of his arm is relieved as it is done in teeth to remove it.
E cove en lu aquo que es entre lor que la extencio sia mollificada; e si alcuna partida de lu es retenguda, lahoras cove que la matrona unte alcus sieus ditz am oli e entrometa aquels espertament e revolva am aquels aquo que es retengut.	And let the extension be softened in that place between them; and if any part of it is held, then cover those mentioned hands with oil and insert those experiments and rotate those that are held.
Donc si la partida del fet es fora-getada, lahoras les uncis sian permudatz entra loc le qual sia pus aut; e fay aysso entro que tot le fet sia fora-getat.	Therefore, if the part of the foot is forgotten, then the joints are moved into a place that is more suitable; and make an incision so that the entire foot is exposed.
Mays si la ma es eyssida denant l’autra, e no es possible reduzir aquela per la coartacio de lu, lahoras cove que drap sia envolopat sobre aquela; e aprop extratz aquela entro que tota sia fora-getada, e inscideys aquela o en la junctura de la ma o en le coyde.	If the hand is twisted to the other side, and it is not possible to reduce it by its ligaments, then cover that area with a cloth; and remove it so that the entire area is exposed, and incise it or at the joint of the hand or in the cavity.
E ayssi cove que fassas en l’autra ma e en les dos pes.	And make sure to do the same in the other hand and both feet.
Mays si le cap del fet es gran, o accideys a lu coartacio en le eyssiment, o es en le cap de lu aygua ajustada, lahoras cove que entrometa entre les ditz espatum spinos e fenda le cap e extragua la aygua, o que discroba aquel am un instrument le qual es nompnat “alundat”, la forma del qual vindra am las formas dels autres instruments en le capitol le qual es aprop aquest.	If the head of the foot is large, or the ligaments are damaged in the ankle, or it is in the joint of the foot, and water is collected there, then insert spatulas between the said parts and cut the head and remove the water, or use an instrument called “alundat”, the shape of which will be found among the other instruments in the capital that is appropriate for this.
E semblantment fassa si·l fet es de gran cap per natura: e lahoras cove que inscida aquel am algematu, o que prengua aquel am alunda ayssi cum havem dit; e aprop extra les osses am les forceps.	Similarly, if the foot is naturally large: and then make an incision at that part, or use an instrument called “alunda” as we have said; and remove the bones with forceps.
E si le cap es eyssit e es coartat deves la furcula, lahoras sia fendut entro que la humiditat la qual es en le pietz sia efunduda.	If the head is dislocated and pressed against the furcula, then it should be cut open to release the moisture that has accumulated in the chest.
Mays si no es complicat, ni obezeys a eyssiment, lahoras tu inscideys le cap tantost segon que a tu sira possible.	If it is not complicated and the patient is not overweight, then you should insert the head as soon as possible according to your ability.
E si le dejos del ventre es apostemat o es en lu ydropici, lahoras cove que tu perfores aquel entro que corro la humiditat que es en lu.	And if the left side of the abdomen is swollen or in hydrocysts, then pierce that which runs the moisture that is in it.
Mays si le fet es sobre les sieus pes, lahoras la atraccio de lu es leugiera e la direccio de lu a la boca de la mayre es leugiera.	If the foot is above the feet, then the direction of the vein should be towards the mouth of the main vein.
Mays si es coartat deves le ventre e·l pietz, lahoras cove que tu extraguas aquel am drap le qual auras envolopat sobre la tua ma, e que fendes le ventre e·l pietz entro que corra aquo que es en aquels.	If the abdomen and chest are pressed together, then remove that which has covered your hand with a cloth, and pierce the abdomen and chest to release that which is in those.
Mays si les autres membres so ostatz e torna le cap, lahoras la metrona entrometa la ma senestra; mays si la boca de la mayre es huberta, lahoras intrometa la ma en le preon de layre, e cerque am aquela le cap, e atira aquel am les ditz entro a la boca de la mayre, e aprop entrometa en lu un unci, o dos uncis, e atire lu am aquels.	If the other members are still and the head returns, then insert your right hand; but if the mouth of the main vein is blocked, then insert your hand into the larynx, and surround that which is on the head, and pull that which is towards the mouth of the main vein, and after inserting one or two inches, pull it out.
E si la boca de la mayre es coartada per apostema caut le qual accideys a l’u, lahoras cove que no sia trebelhat sobre lu; abantz cove lahoras aministrar efusio de causas humidas grassas.	If the mouth of the mother is closed by an abscess that affects the child, do not force it over him; before that, apply a moist, heavy fumigation.
E aministre emplastres; e segua le pacient en ayguas que mollifican e humectan.	And apply ointments; and follow the patient in waters that soften and moisturize.
E si le fet es sobre le sieu costat, lahoras si possible es, sia agulat: e sia aministrat aquo que havem dit en le fet viu.	If the fetus is on its side, try to turn it over if possible; and apply what we have said about the live fetus.
E si aquo no es possible, lahoras sia inscidit en pessas, e sia extrayt.	If that is not possible, then cut it off with scissors and extract it.
E cove que non layssas alcuna causa dedintz de la segondina.	And make sure not to leave any remains of the second trimester.
E cum tu auras complida tota la tua opperacio, lahoras aministra aquo que havem dit de la curacio en les apostemas cautz les quals accideysso de la mayre.	And when you have completed all your work, apply what we have said about the treatment of abscesses that affected the mother.
E si accideys flux de sanc, lahoras deyssendas en ayguas stipticas e aministra l’autra curacio.	And if blood flow occurs, apply cold compresses and administer the other treatment.
E yeu ja e vist una femna en le ventre de la qual era fet mort, e aprop sobre aquel foc autra veguada emprenhada, e aprop foc mort es le fet autre.	And I have seen a woman in the belly of whom was a dead fetus, and another pregnancy started, and another dead fetus was found.
Accidit al u aprop lonc temps apostema en le sieu embelic; e inflat es entro que foc ubert, e comensec a getar brac.	It happened to the man for a long time that an abscess formed in his abdomen; and when fire was brought over it, he began to groan loudly.
E yeu fu appelhat a la cura de lu, e medicat a lu per lonc temps, e la plagua no es consolidada.	And I was called to his care, and I treated him for a long time, but the wound did not heal.
Adonc yeu pausegui sobre lu de alscunas causas emplastra de forta atraccio, e eyssic de lu un os, e aprop passero alcus jorns, e eyssic un autre os; e yeu fu trop meravilhat, cum en le ventre no sia os.	Then I applied some strong-adhesive plasters to him, and after several days, I removed one bone, and after a few more days, I removed another bone; and he was very surprised, as there were no bones in his abdomen.
E adonc yeu cogitegui que eran dels osses del fet mort.	And then he thought that they were the bones of a dead fetus.
Donc yeu enguisigui la plagua, e extrayssi de lu motz osses , la femna existent en las sieuas milhos disposicios, e ja visquec en tal manieyra per lonc temps, correc de lu un petit de brac.	So he continued to suffer from the wound, and he extracted more bones from him, which were already in existence in his abdomen, and had been there for a long time, causing him a small amount of pain.
E yeu no afermegui asso esser stranh, sino quar en aquo es sciensa e ajutori ad aquo que le metge artifec am la ma per curacio aministra.	And he did not deny that it was strange, but rather that in that place there was knowledge and help for that which the skilled physician uses to treat him.
De las formas dels instrumentz que so necessaris a extrayre le fet.	Of the forms of instruments needed to extract the tooth.
Forma de vertitge am la qual es uberta la mayre:	The form of a lever is used to open the mouth:
Aquesta es la forma de strenhedor en le qual so engualhatz les libres, al qual engualhament sian dos virtitges en doas extremitatz de dos futz.	This is the form of a pliers in which the jaws are clamped together, to which clasp there are two levers at both ends of two handles:
May empero aquesta virtitge cove que sia pus subtil de strictori, e sia fayt o de eba o de fust de boys.	But this lever should be more subtle than the clamp, and it should be made of wood or of bone:
E sia la latitut de quascun fust quays dos ditz e le marge de quascu amdos quays un dit, e la longitut de quascu es un palm e mig; e en le mieg loc de dos fustz so dos ajustaments de aquel meteys fustz les quals ja son fermatz, dels quals la longitut es la maytat de un palm e un pauc mes, e la latitut de quascu es quay dos ditz, o un pauc mes.	And the width of each handle should be two fingers wide, and the thickness of each end should be one finger thick; and the length of each is a palm and more; and in the middle of the two handles there are two adjustments of that measuring rod, which are already fixed, whose length is the greatest of one palm and a little more, and the width of each is two fingers, or a little more.
E aquestz dos additamentz sian entromeses en la boca de la mayre per que sia uberta am aquels quan tu revolves las doas prescriptas virtigges.	And these two adjustments should be inserted in the mouth of the jaw so that they can be opened when you turn the two mentioned levers:
Forma autra semblant de aquela pus subtil e pus leugiera:	Another similar form of that very subtle and deceitful disease:
Sia fayta de fustz de eba o de boys segon la semblansa de forceps.	Should be made from a piece of wood or bone according to the likeness of forceps.
Mays empero en la extremitat de lu so dos additament ayssi cum vezes, e la longitut de aquels additament es quays un palm, e la latitut de quascu es dos ditz.	But at the end of that two additions have, like sometimes, and the length of those additions is one span, and the width of each is two digits.
E cum tu vols am aquels ubrir la mayre, lahoras tu fay cezer la femna sobre le lieyt les pes pendentz, ubert aquo que es entre las coyssas de lu.	And when you want to open the largest, then you place your hand on the left side of the foot while the feet hang down, and insert that which is between the patient's thighs.
E aprop obre la tua ma am le instrument ayssi cum fas am forfexs engualment segon la quantitat que vols de la aprecio de la boca de la mayre entro que la metrona fassa so que vols.	And then raise your hand with the instrument like forceps equally according to the amount that you want of the approximation of the mouth of the largest until the midwife makes what you want.
La forma de vertitge la qual diysero les antics:	The form of the chisel which the ancients said:
Forma de impellent am le qual es empellit le fet:	Form of the instrument with which is pushed the fetus:
Forma de amisidat2 am le qual es conterit le cap gran	Form of the forceps with which is held the large head:
E es asemblat a forceps al qual so dentz en la extremitat, ayssi cum vezes, e alcunas veguadas es fayt lonc ayssi cum forceps segon aquesta forma, ayssi cum vezes, al qual so dentz ayssi cum dentz de ressegua am le qual es inscidit e conterit.	And it is similar to forceps at the end, like sometimes, and some of them are made long like this, like sometimes, to which is attached at the end, like the scissors of a seamstress, which is cut and held.
Forma de amesidat pauc:	Form of administration for small doses:
Forma de unci havent una spina:	Form of a single drop:
Forma de unci havent doas spinas:	Form of a double drop:
Forma de forceps a la qual so dentz de cerra am le qual le cap del fet sia conterit:	Form of forceps with which the teeth can be closed and held firmly on the child's head:
Forma de spatum havent dos extremitatz am le qual le cap es abscindit:	Form of a saw with two ends, by which the head is amputated:
Forma de dos espatums latz:	Form of two long saws:
Totz aquels instrumentz so excersitatz, e quan mes so multiplicadas las specias de aquel e so preparadas deves le artifexs, quant es pus leugier a la sua opperacio e pus aut deves les homes per la sua quantitat.	All these instruments are exercised, and as more species of them are multiplied and prepared by the craftsmen, it becomes easier for them to perform their work and less necessary for men due to their quantity.
E no obres de aquels instrumentz ja sia qua sia deves tu aparalhat, quar la necessitat de aquels no es excusabla.	And you should not neglect the work of these instruments, whether it is inside or outside, as the need for them is not excuseable.
De extraccio de la segondina.	Of extraction of the second tooth:
Quan la segondina es retenguda deves le enfantament, lahoras cove que tu comandes a la malautae que retengua le sieu ale, e aprop fay aquela stornudar am condizi, e strenh la tua ma sobre la boca de lu e sobre las nars de lu, e si per aysso es defora eyssit, bo es.	When the second tooth is held, command the patient to hold their breath, then make a strong pressure on the condition, and place your hand over the mouth and nose of the patient, and if by force it does not come out, it is well.
E sino, lahoras tu pren una ola e perfora en la cuberta un trauc e pausa en aquela erbas ubrent la boca de la mayre, ayssi cum calament e ruda e anet e camamilla e scicados arabic e cassia lignea e santaurea.	And if not, then take an egg and pierce it on the cover, and place it in the herbs burning at the mouth of the pot, with salt and rough pepper and anet and camomile and Arabic and cassia lignea and sainturea.
Totas aquestas erbas o alcunas de lor sian submersas en aygua en la ola, e pausa aquela sobre le foc.	All these herbs or some of them are immersed in water in the pot, and place it over the fire.
E aprop pausa una canula de canaviera en la boca de la mayre, e tengua aquela entro que la evapor vengua a la concavitat de la mayre.	And then place a cannula of siphon in the mouth of the pot, and hold it inside until the vapor comes to the bottom of the pot.
E aprop fay aquela stornudar ayssi cum havem dit, e la segondina sira fora-getada am velocitat.	And then do the stirring as we have said, and the second time it is quickly removed.
Mays si roman aprop aquesta curacio e no es eyssida, lahoras tu comanda a la matrona que submerge la sua ma sinistra en oli sizami o en micellage de altea, e aprop entrometa aquela en le conh e queresca am aquela la segondina, e cum aquela auras trobada, lahoras pren la e exten aquela pauc a pauc Mays si es annexsa en le preon de la mayre, lahoras entrometa la sua ma segon que havem recomtat, e quan aura trobat la segondina, extragua aquela petit a petit segon rectetut per so que la mayre no caja deves la atraccio vehement.	If this cure is not effective, then command the midwife to immerse her left hand in olive oil or in a mixture of althea, and then enter it into the womb and rub it with the second time, and when it has found, then take it and extend it little by little if it is attached to the neck of the pot, then enter it the second time as we have recommended, and when it has found the second time, extract it little by little according to how the pot does not catch the attraction vehemently.
Abantz cove que sia permudada als costatz dreyt e sinestre am facilitat.	Before performing the operation, make sure that the patient's arms are extended to the right and left for ease of movement.
E aprop sia ajustat en la quantitat de atraccio, quar ela obedira e evasira de adhirencia.	And then adjust the amount of attraction so that it obeys and avoids adhesion.
E si la boca de la mayre es coartada, nos ja havem recomtat la curacio am sturnutacio e am medicacio de la ola am erbas.	If the mouth of the mother is constricted, we have already recommended the cure of sucking and medication with herbs from the oil.
Mays si no es fora-getada am totas las causas las quals havem recomtadas, lahoras guarda te que no fetigues sobre aquela en iteracio de abstracio, mays empero cove que aquo que es eyssit de lu a la boca de la mayre lies a la coyssa de la femna, e aprop cristeriza aquela am enguent e tetrafarmacon; quar aquel fara poyrir aquela aprop alcus dias e sira dissolvuda e sira fora-getada.	But if all the causes we have recommended are not followed, then remember that whatever is essential to the patient from the body to the mouth of the mother should be placed on the cushion of the woman, and then christen it with a solution of honey and tetrafarmacon; because that will cause it to dissolve and be forgotten.
Mays quan se poyreys, es de lu elevada mala audor al cap, e al estomac, e aquo ledeys la malauta; e adonc cove que sian aministradas sub-fumiguacios e convenientz ad aquo.	But when it dissolves, lift the bad odor to the head, and to the stomach, and that causes the patient to vomit; and then remember that sub-fumigations and appropriate measures should be given to it.
Mays alcus dels Antics ja so esproatz sub-fumigacio de nazitort e de figuas seccas.	May ancient authors also spoke of sublimation of nitre and dried figs.
Forma de instrument am le qual la femna es sub-fumiguada deves la retentio de mestruas e de la segondina:	The form of the instrument by which the woman is sublimated must be for the retention of menstruation and the second.
Sia fayta de veyre o de eram.	It should be made of iron or copper.
E sia pausada la extremitat subtil en le conh e la extremitat ampla sobre le foc, e la sub-fumiguacio sia pausada sobre las brazas del foc.	And the narrow end should be placed in the container and the wide end over the fire, and the sublimation should be placed over the arms of the fire.
E tengua aquela entro que sia consumida aquela sub-fumiguacio e itera·n autra.	And keep that in which that sublimation is consumed and repeat another.
De curacio del cul del enfant no-perforat.	Of the cure of the child's unperforated anus.
Motz enfantz naysso e les culs de lu no so perforatz, les quals ya ciphac subtil e opilat.	When newborn children and their anuses are not perforated, which are already narrow and tightly closed.
Adonc cove a la matrona que perfore am le sieu dit aquel ciphac; e sino, perfora aquel am spatum agut, e guarda se que no toque le lacert.	Then ask the midwife to pierce that narrow part; and if not, pierce that space sharply, and be careful not to touch the sphincter.
E aprop pause sobre aquel lana enfusa en vi e oli; e aprop cura aquel am enguent entro que sia senat.	And place your hand over that wool soaked in vinegar and oil; and cure that opening where it is not open.
Mays si temes que sia opilat, lahoras pausa en le trauc una canula per motz dias, e osta la quan le enfant voldra degerir.	If you fear that he may be choking, then place a tube in his throat to help him breathe, and remove it when he wants to cough.
E ja accideys oppilacio del cul per consolidacio de plagua o de apostema; adonc cove que aquela consolidacio sia inscidida, e aprop sia curada am aquo que avem dit de la curacio e del plom.	And if you have experienced choking of the anus due to the consolidation of a plague or abscess; then make sure that this consolidation is not cut, and then cure it with the remedy we have mentioned for the cure and the poultice.
De curacio de las fistulas que endeveno dejos.	Of the cure of fistulas that occur afterward.
Las fistulas que endeveno en la partida dejos pus bassa so nodacio e grossetut las quals endeveno prop del cul defora o en l’espazi de la una partida.	The fistulas that occur in the lower part of the abdomen, which are often large and occur near the anus or in the space between the buttocks.
E es una fistula o motas.	And if it is a fistula or pustule.
E cum aquela nodacio es antiquada e corr de la humiditat aygosa blanca o poyridura subtil, e alcunas veguadas so de aquestas fistulas alcunas penetrantz.	And if that swelling is ancient and comes from the moisture, a white or thin pus, and some of these fistulas penetrate.
E aquelas penetrantz so conogudas per aquo que es eyssit de aquelas per la egressio e per ventosetat; e alcunas vetz use le malaute de egressio, e fort leu es eyssit de aquelas verm.	And those that penetrate are recognized by the presence of worms, for their exit and for their windiness; and some patients use the patient's excrement, and it is often found in these worms.
E so de aquelas fistulas alcunas veguadas en l’espazi penetrantz entro a la vesica, e entro al meat de la vergua; e so de aquelas penetrantz entro la junctura de la coyssa e entro al notz de la coeta.	And some of those fistulas are sometimes visible in the space penetrating into the bladder, and into the meat of the penis; and some penetrate into the joint of the thigh and into the navel of the buttocks.
E aquo en que es conoguda fistula penetrant entro al cul e no-penetrant, es que tu metas le tieu dit endic en le cul, e entrometas tenta subtil de eram o de ferr en la fistula quan no y es turtuositat.	And in that which is known as a fistula penetrating into the anus and not penetrating, you insert your finger into the anus, and then gently probe the fistula with a soft or iron tool when it is not turgidity.
Mays si en aquela es turtuositat, lahoras entromet en aquela tenta subtil de plom o de pels de caval entro que tu sentas la tenta o le pel en le tieu dit.	But if there is turgidity in that place, then gently probe with a soft or horsehair tool until you feel the tool or the hair in your finger.
E si no sentas aquela de tot ni no procezeys del trauc alcuna causa de egestio ni verm ni ventositat, ayssi cum havem dit, lahoras sapias que es no-penetrant, e lahoras coyta te a la curacio.	And if you do not feel that at all or do not proceed due to some cause of diarrhea, vomiting, or flatulence, as we have said, then know that it is not penetrating, and then treat it accordingly.
E quan la fistula es penetrant entro a la vesica o entro al meat de la vergua, lahoras la significacio de lu es eyssiment de urina de aquela e prohibicio de lu ad aysso que·l loc am medicina sia consolidat.	And when the fistula is penetrating into the bladder or into the meat of the penis, then the meaning of that is necessarily urine from that place and prohibition of that so that that place may be consolidated by medicine.
Mays si es penetrant entro la junctura de la coyssa o entro al os e envencio de dolor en le circuit, lahoras senhal de lu es que la tenta perve entro aqui si en lu no es turtuositat entro al os, e envencio de dolor en le circuit de la partida; e que de lu yeys poyredura tostemps; e que no val en aquela medicacio, ni es consolidada am enguent.	If the pain penetrates into the joint of the thigh or into the bone and causes severe pain in the circumference, it is then called a boil if there is no turgescence inside the bone, and severe pain in the circumference of the limb; and that from there it often spreads quickly; and that it does not work in that medication, nor is it consolidated with ointment.
E en totas aquelas fistulas penetrant no es curacio de tot, e la curacio de aquelas es trebalh e vanetat dels folyls metges sobre·l qual so fermatz. Mays en aquela que no es penetrant e no antiqua, sanacio am ferr es sperada segon que yeu a tu recomtare, e aquo que ja yeu e proat.	If in that which is not penetrating and ancient, the cure is done by iron and is spread according to what I have advised you and what has been done before.

E si aquela sent le malaute entorn le cuol, lahora cove que tu entrometas le tieu dit endic en le cuol.	And if the patient has pain in their abdomen, then you should insert your finger into the belly.

Mays empero diyssero alcus que es sana en alcus homes tart.	However, they say that this is healing in some people who are sick with the dart.

E aprop cura aquela am calguas envolopadas en boder entro que en yescan totas aquelas carns que so adhustas, e aprop cura aquela am medicinas la carn engendrantz e consolidantz, e si es sanada, bo es; e sino, lahoras no es sana en degun temps per autra curacio. E si la tenta intra, e no penetra entro·l tieu dit le qual es en le cul, e entre aquel e la tenta que es velament spes de carn o de ciphac, e vezes la fistula en aquo que siec la superficia de la codena, lahoras secca la codena del comensament de la fistula, e tu ve seccan am la tenta, e sia en la fistula entro que la seccio pervengua al loc en le qual perve la extremitat de la tenta, e per la tenta es liberat e catz.	If the probe enters, and does not penetrate into the abdomen, which is in the buttocks, and between the probe and the abdomen is a velament, of flesh or of skin, and if the fistula is in that place, then dry the flesh from the beginning of the fistula, and you see if the probe dries inside the fistula, and if the drying reaches the location where the end of the probe is, and through the probe it is released and cautery.
E aprop mundifiqua aquelas carns fistuladas las quals so asembladas a canula de pena de ausel e no romangua de aquelas alcuna causa.	And then clean those fistulas that are assembled like a pen quill and do not have any cause of those.

E so medicinas en las quals so stipticitat e exseccio; quan lahoras es restaurada ja es sanada e no temes iteracio.	And in these remedies, which have astringency and drainage; when it is restored, it is healed and there is no fear of recurrence.
Mays si la fistula ja perve entro al preon del cul e es elonguada de lu superficia del cos, lahoras entromet le tieu dit en le cul e inquireys am aquel. E donc si centes la tenta e entre tu e ela es velament de ciphac o de carn, e es propda a la penetracio, lahora no es operacio en lu sino segon via di fiducia e de speransa. The cause of this is to administer it in that place in one of three ways: either to cauterize that as we have said; or to dry out that so that you can possibly enter those and the cure provided, and do not process any for the reason that you do not incise the skin containing the bowel, and that an accident occurs on the patient's will and the evidence; and then cure that which we have said is very strong to heal; or lengthen that covering and cleanse that which dries out that into the anus, as we have said, or with the tent or another instrument of sharp extremity, and cleanse those fistulated flesh which are in the section inside where you can perform the crustation; and then force yourself to restore the whole wound section, and if the outlet below is not consolidated, and the fistula remains open in the part of the anus, and is more painful for the patient.

e entromet en aquela fiel envolopat de v fiels o entorn aquels; e aprop entromet tenta am fiel en la fistula entro que consiegua la conquavitat de lu.	and insert it into that layer of fat or around those; and then insert the tent into the fistula until it reaches its cavity.

De sutura de emorroydas en las quals corra sanc en la inscizio de aquelas.	Stitching of edematous parts where there is inflammation at the beginning of those.
Emorroydas so segon dos manieyras, quar o so entre le cul semblantz aysi que es de carbos, o quays aquelas sian cum a gras de rasim.	Edematous parts are of two kinds, either between the buttocks like charcoal, or those which are like grease.

Adonc tu te coyte e suspen am uncis o que tenguas aquelas am la tua ungla, e aprop incideys aquelas deves las suas razitz.	Then you sit and support the patient's arms or whatever you have to hold them with, and then incise their ribs.
Mays si les uncis no so tengutz en aquelas per la humiditat de lor e mollificacio de aquelas, lahoras pren aquelas am drap aspre o am coto o am flassada de lana, e extratz aquelas am les tieus ditz, e aprop inscideys aquelas e polveriza sobre lor alcunas polveras caudas aprop la inscizio, per que sian ad aquelas en loc de cauteri; o cauteriza aquelas segon que es precedit en le capitol de cauterizar.	But if the arms are not held with those because of their moisture and softness, then take those with a rough cloth or a cotton cloth or a woolen blanket, and extract those with the scissors, and then incise those and powder some caustics on the incision, so that they are in place as a cauterizer; or cauterize them according to what is prescribed in the chapter on cauterization.
E aprop cura aquelas am l’autra curacio entro que sian sanadas.	And then cure those with the other cure until they are healed.
E si le cul no obezeys a egressio, lahoras cristerisa le malaute am cristeri en le qual sia mordicacio petita, e sia lavat am aquel aquo que es en le cuol e que obezesca a egressio leugierament quan le malaute s’esprem.	And if the wound does not obey the exit, then crucify the patient with a cross in which there is a small mordicacy, and bathe them with that water which is in the belly and which obeys the exit more when the patient expires.
Mays si las emorroydas so defora le cul, lahoras la causa de lor es leugiera, e es que tu prenguas aquelas am la tua ungla, o que prenguas aquelas am unci, e inscidas aquelas, e aprop cura aquelas am aquo que havem dit entro que sian sanadas.	If the swollen parts deform the buttocks, the cause of this is usually fleas, and you should remove them with your nail, or with a pin, and scrape them off, and then cure them with the remedy we mentioned earlier when they are healed.
E aquel que avoreys inscizio, cove que aministres sutura de lor segon aquesta manieyra: pren fiel envolopat e entromet aquel en agulha e aprop extratz las emorroydas a las partidas dessus, e fay aquel penetrar am la agulha en la razit del autra part, e envolveys las doas extramitatz del fiel en la partida pus dejos de la agulha, e so latitudinalment; e estrenh la emorroyda am strectura fort, e aprop noza le fiel e extratz la agulha.	And the one who comes before should administer a second suture according to this method: take a thread wrapped around an awl and insert it into the swelling at the top parts, and make the awl penetrate the other part, and wrap the two ends of the thread on the part behind the awl, and longitudinally; and strongly tie the swelling to the structure, and remove the thread and the awl.
E fay aquo a totas, e layssa de aquelas una e no la cozes, per so que la superfluitat del sanc corra de aquela.	And do this to all of them, and leave one undone so that the excess of the cure comes from that one.
E aprop pausa sobre le cul drap enfus en oli rozat o en cerot; e pausa aquel sobre·l cuol e comanda al malaute que·s repause.	And place a cloth soaked in rose oil or wax on the buttocks; and place that on the wound and command the patient to rest.

De curacio de fistulas.	Of the treatment of fistulas.
Motas veguadas accideys per exseccacio de fenda o per costriccio de natura.	Fistulas caused by excessive dryness or natural constriction.
E cum so antiquadas e no val en aquela medicina, lahoras cove que tu razas aquelas am la puncta de spatum o am la tua ungla entro que sian faytas humidas e sia hostada de aquelas la escorsa pus desus, la qual prohibeys aquelas de consolidacio; e aprop cura aquelas entro que sian consolidadas.	And if those remedies do not work in that medicine, then prick those wet areas with a needle or your nail, and place the scab from above on them, which prevents them from consolidating; and then care for those that have consolidated.
Lahoras tu osta aquelas am razio pus vehement que la primieyra entro que mot sancno e sian excoriadas; e aprop cura aquelas entro que sian sanadas.	Then apply those wet areas with a stronger plaster than the first one, and care for those that have healed.
De curacio de almesamir, so es clau.	Of the treatment of almsamen.
Sapias que alamermar, so es clau, e no es si no notz redon segon la color del cors semblant a cap de claviel, e es fayt en tot le cors e majorment en las partidas dejos les pes e als ditz, e endeve per aquels dolor deves le anament.	You know that almsamen, as it is called, is not red like a claviel, and is found throughout the body and mainly in the parts below the feet and the knees, and causes those painful swellings.
E adonc cove que sia inscidit aquo que es en le circuit del clau, e sia tengut am les forfexs o am unci, e sia eradicat de la sua razit; e aprop cura aquel.	And then cut that which is inside the nail circle, and hold it with forceps or tweezers, and remove it from its place; and then care for that.
E si vols, cauteriza le segont que es precedit en le sieu capitol.	And if you wish, cauterize the second as it is preceded in its chapter.
Mays de veruca es eminencia petita aspre fistulada redonda sobre la superficia del cos, e motas veguadas veno en las mas dels enfantz.	The wart is a small elevated, round, fistula on the surface of the skin, and it causes pain in the joints of children.
E curacio de lu es que estendas e inscidas aquela, o que estrenhas aquela am fiel o am pel entro que caja.	And its treatment is that you extend and cut it, or that you remove it with forceps or a needle.

E ja so eradicadas enversas e no-enversas am le instrument le qual yeu diyre.	And the instruments that I would say are already removed.
Mays formica es eminencia petita feutrada o fistulada grossa sobre la superficia del cos anant mot en le preon, e quan le freg atroba aquela es centit en lu semblant de mordificacio de formigua, e es fayta entorn le cos.	The ant is a small, feathered or large, fistula on the surface of the skin, and when it bites there, it causes a similar bite as an ant, and it is made around the skin.

And its treatment is that you take a needle of pen or voltor, and it should be strong, and place the ant over the ant within the circle of the needle parts; and then rotate your hand with the needle through which you cut it, and place it in the flesh, and remove the ant from its place.
E si vols, fay aquo am canula de eram o de ferr segon aquesta forma:	And if you wish, do this with a needle or iron in this manner:
Sia la partida desus de la canulha trahent a subtilitat, sorda (so es no-perforada), envolopada per so que sobre le dit la aprencio de lu sia ablaviada e la revolucio de aquela.	The part above the needle should be thinned out, unbroken (not pierced), wrapped by someone who can remove any impurities and turn it around.

De forma dels instrumentz que so aministratz a dar cristeri.	In the form of instruments that are used to give cristeri (a type of medicine).
Alcunas veguadas es fayt cristeri de argent o de lato o de eram fondut o malleat; e alcunas veguadas es fayt de aquels instrumentz petit e gran segon aquels als quals so aministratz, quar aquel que es aministrat en la curacio dels petitz enfants sia petit; e de aquel dels quals los culs son freuls o doloyrozes, les cristeris de aquels sian petitz.	Some veguadas (a type of medicine) are made from silver or lead or melted or hammered; and some veguadas are made from those instruments that are small and large according to those that are administered, because the one that is administered in the cure of small children should be small; and from those of which the bellies are inflamed or painful, the cristeris of those should be small.
La forma de cristeri gran e pauc:	The form of large and few cristeri (medicines):
Le cap de la canula de lu desus en le qual es liada la borsa sia ampla segon aquesta manieyra; e sia a lu distinacio la on la borsa es liada ayssi cum vezes. E sia la borsa en la qual sian pausadas las medicinas de vesica de bestia o de pel de ovelha, e la razit de lu sia un palm.	And the bag in which the medicines of the bladder of an animal or of lamb's wool are placed, and the lid of it is a palm.

And then the patient should be placed on their back, and their thighs raised, with a cushion or pillow under them; and a cloth soaked in olive oil, or album of hen's eggs, or mucilage of fenugreek or similar substance, should be inserted into the rectum to facilitate evacuation. E si la medicina forsa aquel a eyssiment, tengua le tant quant poyra; e si dorm am aquel per tota una nueyt, es mays derier en juvament.	If the medicine does not work as expected, hold it in as much as possible; if you fall asleep while taking it for the whole night, it is better to take it in the morning.
Mays si tu cristerizas aquel en las malautias de solucio de ventre e l’eyssiment de lu le coyta, lahoras tu itera le cauteri entro que sia sanat.	However, if you clean the patient in the solutions of the belly and the evacuation of them, then repeat the cautery until they are healed.
E si en le cul so emorroydas o apostemas ledens, lahoras sia le cristeri mot subtil e leon, dels cristeris am les quals les enfantz so criterisatz.	And if there are pus or abscesses in the rectum, then use a soft and thin bowel, from the bowels that infants are made of.
De curacio de las plaguas.	Of the treatment of plaques
Yeu ja e dit en la divisio de la curacio de las plaguas aquo que convenia al libre, e yeu dic assi la curacio de aquelas am ma e am medicinas segon le conpliment.	It has already been said in the division of the treatment of plaques that this was appropriate for the free man, and thus the treatment of those who are sick and require medicine according to the complement.
Donc dic que las plaguas son diversificadas segon aquo en que son faytas las plaguas e segon le loc sobre le qual cazo las plaquas.	Therefore, it is said that the plaques are diverse according to what kind of plaque they are and where they occur on the body.
E las causas per que motas vetz son faytas las plaguas so ayssi cum getament de peyra, o inscisio d’espaza o de cotel, o percussio am lansa, o am fustz, o am sageta, o semblantz ad aquels de motas causas.	And the causes for which plaques are formed are similar to those of gout, or incision by a spade or a dagger, or percussion from a lance, a stick, a sword, or similar to those of gout.
Mays las plaguas que so en les locz del cos so ayssi cum plagua la qual catz sobre le cap, o·l col, o·l pietz, o·l ventre, o·l fitge, e semblantz ad aquels dels membres.	May the plaques that occur in the parts of the body be similar to those that cat on the head, or neck, or chest, or stomach, or back, and similar to those of the limbs.
E yeu so recomtant la curacio de alcunas plaguas per que pauses aquela ratiocinacio e regla sobre las autras plaguas.	And thus, the treatment of some plaques is recommended because it follows that reason and rule for the other plaques.
E yeu comensare de las plaguas del cap simplas, quar la rememoracio de las compostas vindra al comensament del tertz capitol.	And I will begin with the simple wounds of the head, for the memory of the composed ones will come at the beginning of the third chapter.
Donc dic que quan accideys en le cap plagua simpla e no es fractura, lahoras considera: si es per getament de peyra o de semblant, e ja ha trinquada la codena tant solament e es gran plagla e temes sobre aquel malaute havinement de apostema caut, lahoras tu te coyta e fleubotoma la cephalica tantost, e no tardas aquo; e extrats ad aquel del sanc segon la quantitat de la vertut de lu si no mes alcuna causa prohibent de fleubotomia, majorment si·l sanc que es eyssit de la plagua es pauc.	Therefore, it is said that when a simple wound occurs in the head and is not a fracture, if it is from a stone or something similar, and has only been washed with water and is large and you fear for that patient due to the risk of abscess, then you should first apply leeches to the cephalic vein as soon as possible, and do not delay this; and then extract the pus according to the amount of its virtue if no other cause prevents leeching, especially if the wound that exists from the wound is small.
E sia la flaubotomia del contrari de la partida plaguada; e guardase le malaute de replecio e de vi e de viandas grossas.	And if the leeching is from the opposite side of the wound, then keep the patient away from repletion and vigorous activity and heavy foods.
Mays si de la minuicio prohibeys alcuna causa, lahoras sia aminorat de la vianda e no apropinque a carn ni a vi.	But if there is any cause that prohibits the leeching, then reduce the food and do not approach meat or fish.
E pausa sobre la plagua, si a lu accideys apostema caut, coto enfus en oli rozat solet o en vi en le qual es stipticat.	And place upon the wound, if an abscess occurs, apply a poultice made of olive oil mixed with rosemary or vinegar that is styptic.
Mays si est segur de apostema caut, lahoras pausa sobre la plagua, si es recent am le sieu sanc e le ayre no ha mudat aquela la polvera la qual yeu recomtare aprop petit.	However, if it is certain that an abscess has occurred recently and the air has not changed, then apply a powder that I will recommend to you.
E si le ayre ja ha mudada aquela, lahoras pausa sobre alscus enguentz entro que sia sanada.	And if the air has already changed, then apply a poultice made of herbs that are not yet healed.
Mays si la plagua es gran o es per inscizio d’espaza e de semblantz, e no so ajustadas las labias de lu per puvils, lahoras ajusta aquelas am sutura segon que yeu recomtare de la sutura de lor.	However, if the wound is large or has sharp edges and the lips of it are not adjusted by stitches, then adjust them according to what I will recommend for the stitching of such wounds.
Mays si la plagua ja es discuberta del os e pen, e no es retencio de lu sino un petit suspensori, lahoras inscideys aquela e aprop cura la plagua am medicinas e restaura la carn aprop en loc de codena, e comanda al malaute que sia pescut de viandas en las quals es groceza: caps e formen coyt e semblantz a lor, entro que sia compost.	However, if the wound has already exposed bone and pus, and it is not retained by stitches but only a small suspensory, then scrape away that and apply medicines to the wound and restore flesh in place of the codeina, and command the patient to eat foods in which there is grease: such as caps and similar things, until it is healed.
E si atrobas en la codena putrefaccio e no adhereys al os, lahoras tu inscideys tot aquo poyrit e geta aquo, e aprop cura aquo.	If the bone in the cavity is rotten and does not stick to the bone, then you scrape off all that and wash it, and then cure it.
Mays si en aquestas plaguas es arteria o vena de la qual fluxs de sanc pot evenir, e no es abscindida per medicinas, lahoras tu inquier sobre la arteria, e si atrobas aquela no-inscidida, lahoras tu inscideys aquela am spatum, o lia aquela; e si necessitat te provoca que aquo que havem dit no comfereys, lahoras tu cauteriza entro que·l sanc sia abscidit.	If in these wounds there is an artery or vein from which blood can flow and is not cut by medicine, then you should look for the artery, and if you find it uncut, then scrape it with a spatula or tie it; and if it is necessary that what we have said does not work, then you cauterize where the pus is removed.
E si aquestas plaguas son simplas e petitas, lahoras la causa de lor es leugiere; enayssi que tu polverizas sobre aquelas aquesta polvera, quar consolidada aquela denant que l’ayre mude aquelas.	If these wounds are simple and small, then their cause is light; however, you should powder them with this powder, which solidifies when it comes into contact with the air, which moves them.
E la manieyra de la polvera es aquesta: recipe oli de enses partida una, de sanc de drago partida doas, de caus no-extincta partidas tres; sia tot mot trissat e crivellat, e de lu sia la plagua omplida, e sia constrengida per bona constriccio entro que be sobre aquela aderesca, e sia coagulada am le sanc.	The method of the powder is as follows: take one part of olive oil, two parts of dragon's blood, and three parts of unextinguished charcoal; mix all this into a fine powder, and then fill the wound with it, and compress it with good compression until it sticks to the wound, and coagulate it with the pus.
E aprop strengeys aquela desus am pulvils e leyssa aquela, e no la deslias mentre esta ayssi que no es apostemada, quar no es eredicada de lu la medicina entro que sia sanada.	And then tightly press that above the powder and leave it there until it is not stuck, because it is not cured of it until the medicine enters and heals.
E alcuna vetz fa aquo sola cautz, quan no es a tu en present enses e sanc de drago.	And some people do that alone with cauterization when you are not present and it is not from a dragon.
E ja fa aquesta meteyssa operacio en las grans plaguas quan conveneys que sia pausada sobre aquelas e sian streytas, e so plaguas recentz am le lor sanc, las quals le ayre no ha alteradas.	And this surgical operation is performed in large wounds when it is necessary to be placed on those and be tightened, and their recent wounds are covered with a clean cloth, which has not been altered by air.
E si le ayre las ha alteradas, e majorment quan es en temps d’estiu, lahoras no es entencio a la posicio de aquesta polvera, mays adonc cura aquelas am aquo que havem dit, enayssi que tu pauses sobre aquelas alcus enguents degistius, o que pauses sobre aquelas pols de la farina del ordi am aygua e mel entro que getan poyredura; e aprop cura aquelas am l’autra curacio entro que sian sanadas.	And if the air has altered them, and especially when it is in the summer time, then this powder position is not used, but rather cure those with that which we have said, unless you place it on those wounds with a dressing of diastious or place it on those wounds with a paste of flour and water until they are completely healed; and then cure them with the other cure until they are healed.
Mays si accideys am la plagua fractura en os, e es petita, lahoras tu extratz aquo am gesti.	But if an accident occurs to the wound fracture in bone, and it is small, then you remove that with that which we have said.
E yeu diyre la cura de las fracturas del cap en aquo que es envenidor.	And I will say the cure for the fractures of the head in this case is poisonous.
De las plaguas del col.	Of the plagues of the neck.
Mays si la plagua accideys en le col, lahoras no es en lu differencia en medicacio, e entre la plagua del cap quan es simpla.	But if the plague occurs in the neck, it is not different in medicine, and between the plague of the head when it is simple.
Mays si ja le nervi del col es inscis o arteria, lahoras si es nervi, no es en lu engen sino que sia evitada curacio de lu am aquo que fa vehement stipticitat, ayssi cum ziniar e zegi que es vetriol e semblantz a lor quar nozo als nervis e contrazo aquel.	But if the nerves of the neck are cut or the artery, then if it is nerves, not in the engine but rather to avoid cure of which causes strong stanching, as well as ziniar and zegi that is verdigris and similar to their four nozo to the nerves and contrazo aquel.
E no pauses sobre la plagua alcuna causa de tot freja, quar la sustancia dels nervis es freja e la continuacio de lu es am le cervel, le qual es le pus aut de totz les membres.	And do not place anything over the plague of any cause of all flesh, because the substance of the nerves is flesh and the continuation of which is to the brain, which is the most important of all the members.
E si’ aquo am que es curat de medicinas leugieras, ayssi cum es caus lavada am aygua dousa, alcuna veguada enfusa en oli rozat o no-rozat, e thucia quan es lavada am aygua dousa e las autras peyras minarantz segon aquesta manieyra, e enguentz humitz.	And if that which is cured of false medicines, as it is caused by washing with warm water, some vapor infused in olive oil or not-olive oil, and thucia when washed with warm water and the others peyras minarantz according to this manner, and found humitz.
Mays si la plagua es gran, lahoras aministra sutura, o coarta las labias de lu, e aprop cura aquela am pulvils entro que sia sanada.	If the wound is large, then administer stitches or tie the lips of it, and then care for that area with powders until it is healed.
Mays si a la plagua es profunditat o accideys en lu a la pus bassa partida poyredura, lahoras perfora aquela en le loc mays depremegut.	If the wound has depth or accidents in the lowest part, then puncture it in the most suitable place.
Mays si en la plagua ja es inscisa arteria e es conseguit flux de sanc, lahoras separa o secca aquela, o lia aquela, o cauteriza aquela si necessitat te provoca ad aquo.	If the wound has an incised artery and bleeding occurs, then separate or dry it, tie it, or cauterize it if necessary to prevent that from happening.
Mays si ja ha insciditz les spondils del golayro o tot, e so salvadas las venas del col, lahoras tu ajusta las labias de la codena am sutura sobre la cana del golayro e no toques aquel; abantz egala aquel e reduzeys aquel sobre la sua figura natural, e aprop strenh aquel am strectura decent, e leyssa aquela per alcus jorns; e aprop cura aquel am enguentz en les quals es stipticitat e excitacio entro que sia sanat.	If the ribs of the chest have been incised and the veins of the collarbone are saved, then adjust the lips of the wound with stitches over the edge of the chest and do not touch that; equalize it and reduce it to its natural shape, and apply a structure that is decent, and care for that area with ointments in which there is stiptic effect and excitation until it is healed.
Mays si la plagua ja en le os a fayta enprecio, lahoras percuireys aquela, e lahoras si en lu ha fragmentz de hos, extratz totz aquels que podes de lor; e aquo que a tu no es apparelhat, leyssa aquo entro que la plagua se poyrisca, e sia separat e la egrecio de lu sia alleujada.	If the wound has penetrated into the bone, then perforate it, and if there are fragments of bone in it, remove all of them that you can; and what is not visible to you, leave it alone until the wound heals, and it will be separated and the edges of it will be united.
E si la plagua es recent lahoras polveriza sobre aquela polvera la qual t’e recomtada.	And if the wound is recent, then sprinkle powder over it that was recommended to you.
Mays si en la plagua es fayta fistula, lahoras cura aquela am aquo del qual la rememoracio vindra aprop en le sieu capitol.	But if the wound has become a fistula, then cure it with the same thing that the memory of which will soon come to its own capital.
De las plaguas del col o de semblantz quan fayta entre las spallas e es fayta am spaza o am cotel o am lansa o am semblantz.	Of the wounds of the neck or similar ones that are made between the ribs and are made with a space or a knife or a lance or a similar thing.
Si es percussio de lansa o de cotel, e vezes de lu la profunditat, lahoras considera mays si de la plagua yeys ventositat quan le malaute elena; lahoras sapias que la plagua es mortal.	If it is a percussion of a lance or a knife, and sometimes you see the depth of it, then consider more if the wound has bleeding when the patient inhales; then you will know that the wound is fatal.
E si en lu no es profunditat e la plagua es recent am le sieu sanc, lahoras tu pauses en lu de la primieyra horo polvera, e no strenhas aquel per que no sia le sanc retengut en la profunditat de lu e que retorne al cor e que aucigua le malaute, mays pausa en lu enguent atractiu, e deslia aquela doas veguadas le dia.	And if there is no depth in it and the wound is recent at its own place, then you should place powder on it during the first hour, and not strengthen that so that the wound does not remain in the depth of it and that it returns to the heart and that no one hurts the patient, but rather pause in that attractive place, and delay those days.
E si l’enguent no es a tu present, lahoras tu pausa en le orrifici de la plagua coto viel per que sucque aquo que yeys de las humiditatz; e fay que le malaute dorma sobre la plagua per que corra aquo que es en lu ajustat.	And if the mouth is not present, then place your hand on the orifice of the wound, so that the liquid from the humors can drain; and make the patient lie on their side so that the liquid in them can flow out.
Mays si ja de la plagua son passatz tres dias o mays e no accideys al malaute spasme ni tremor de cor mal ni strictura de ale, e vezes las autras dispozicios bonas de lu, lahoras sapias que plagua es salva; e adonc cura aquela am calguas e am l’autra curacio entro que sia sanada.	If the wound has passed three days or more without causing spasms, trembling of the heart, or stricture of the abdomen, and other signs are good for the wound, then know that the wound is healing; and then apply ointment to one side and another treatment until it is healed.
Mays si la sanacio de lu es excusada, e ja tot temps es uberta, lahoras sapias que ja es fayta fistula; cura donc aquela per le sieu capitol.	If the healing of the wound is delayed, and it has been opened for a long time, then know that it has become a fistula; treat it therefore by its own method.
E si la plagua es per inscisio de spaza o de cotel, e es simpla en la superficia del pietz o del dos, lahoras cura aquela am aquo que es precedit de sutura, si es gran, o am polvera, si es petita.	And if the wound is caused by a cut or a thrust, and it is simple on the surface of the thigh or back, then treat it with water that is used before stitching, if it is large, or with powder, if it is small.
Mays si ja ha fayta enprecio en le os, e so ja de lu inscizas pessas, lahoras tu torqua la plagua e coyta ad extrayre aquelas pessas, si so separadas.	If there has already been an incision in the bone, and it is already cut through, then twist the plate and pull to extract those pieces, if they are separated.
Mays si no so separadas, lahoras leyssa las entro que se poyresca la plagua, que la extraccio de lor es alleujada.	If they are not separated, then insert the instruments that can reshape the plate, to facilitate their extraction.
E de las autras plaguas accidentz en les autres membres le juvament en curacio es le juvament de aquo que havem dit.	And from the other plates in other members, the treatment in cure is the same as what we have said.
De las plaguas del ventre.	Of the plates of the belly.
L’indisposicio la qual accideys en le ventre es o gran, o pauc, o migiera.	The disposition that occurs in the belly is either large, or small, or mixed.
De la gran alcunas veguadas yeys le budel o nervi del budel, per que es fayta intromissio de lor e la sutura de lor esser pus vehement e pus subtil.	Some veins and nerves of the belly, because they are inserted deeply and sutured deeply and subtly.
E disrupcio petita es fayta dificil per autra manieyra, e siec se que la reduccio de lor es pus dificil, si no te coytes de la intromissio de lor al sieu loc tantost, quar se ubre e es engrossat per que le intrament de lu es fayt difficil.	And disruption of small veins is difficult to treat by another method, and it is known that the reduction of them is more difficult, so you should not wait to insert them at their proper place as soon as possible, because they are open and swell, making it difficult to treat.
E donc la milhor disrupcio es migiera, quar en aquela no es dificil la reduccio del budel, ayssi cum es dificil en las doas specias denant ditas.	And therefore the best disruption is that in which it is not difficult to reduce the intestine, as it is difficult in the two species called hernias.
E sapias que sutura del ventre es segon quatre manieyras, mays doas suturas son comunas que conveneysso en suturas de las autras plaguas del cors.	You should know that the abdominal suture is performed in four ways, but two common methods are sufficient for sutures of other parts of the body.
E duas autras suturas proprias comunican a las autras plaguas, mays empero so mays proprias en la sutura del ventre.	And two other proper sutures connect to other parts of the body, but they are more proper for the abdominal suture.
E yeu recomti a tu quascuna am exposicio e declaracio.	I advise you to have each exposure and declaration.
Donc dic que quan la plagua es petita e es eyssit alcuna causa del budel per aquela, e es fayt dificil a reduzir aquel, lahoras aquo es en una de doas manieyras: o per parvitat de la disrupcio ayssi cum havem dit, o quan al budel es venguda inflacio per la frigiditat de l’ayre.	Therefore, say that when the part is small and there is no cause of the intestine for that, and it is difficult to reduce it, then it is in one of the two methods: either by paravent of the disruption as we have said, or when the intestine becomes inflamed due to cold air.
E donc quan aquo es ayssi, lahora cove que tu scalfes aquel enayssi que tu submerges una sponga ho drap humit en aygua tebeza sola, o que coguas en aygua squinant, e cyperum, e spic, e embroques am aquela le budel entro que la imflacio sia resolvuda.	And therefore when that is so, cover the wound with a cloth soaked in warm water alone, or with a poultice made of boiled barley, cumin, and spices, and apply it to the intestine before the inflammation is resolved.
E alcunas veguadas fa aquo vi en le qual ha stipticitat, e es milhor que la aygua sola en resolucio de la imflacio.	Some people do this in which there is astringency, and it is better than water alone in resolving inflammation.
E donc cum tu vezes la imflacio esser resolvuda, lahoras tu humecta le budel am aygua en la qual es coyta altea e malvas, quar per aquo es alleujat le intrament de lu am pauca causa.	And when you see that the inflammation has been resolved, then you moisten the intestine with water in which salt and vinegar are mixed, because for this the instrument of the patient is relieved from much pain.
Mays si es escusat le intrament de lu aprop aquesta curacio, lahoras scindeys la disrupcio un petit am strument am le qual so inscididas emorroydas.	But if the instrument of the patient is not removed from this cure, then divide the disruption with a small sharp instrument that is not blunted by rust.
E la curacio primieyra es milhor, quan es propriada que no es seccio, e no sia occupacio a seccar aprop necessitat e defaliment.	The first cure is best when it is proper that it not be dry, and not occupied by the need to dry and defecate.
Del instrument, sec se la forma de lu:	Of the instrument, if its shape is like this:
La una partida de lu torta aguda, e l’autra partida no-acuta, e la extremitat subtil, e no sia am la subtilitat de spatum, abantz sia obtusa un pauc.	One part of it is sharp and pointed, and the other part is not sharp, and its tip is thin, but not as thin as a needle, with a slightly blunt edge in front.
E donc cum la plagua es amplificada e yeys fora le budel, lahoras cove que la sua reduccio sia segon la forma de lu natural, en le sieu loc propri, si es possible sobre aquo, quar milhor es.	And when the plague has increased and the intestine is pushed out, then return it to its original shape, in its proper place, if possible above water, because that is better.
Mays quan la disrupcio es ampla, e es en la partida pu bassa del ventre, lahoras cove que tu fassas jazer le malaute sobre le sieu dos, e pausa las suas cambas pus autas que·l sieu cap; e si es en la partida pus desus del ventre, lahoras tu pause le cap de lu e·l pietz pus autz que las partidas dejos.	When the disruption is widespread, and it is in the lower part of the belly, then make the patient lie on their stomach, and place your hand on their back as high as possible; and if it is in the upper part of the belly, then place your hand on their head and the other on their chest as high as possible.
E semblantment si la disrupcio es en una de las doas partz del ventre, lahoras pausa la tua entencio e la tua consideracio tostemps en aysso per que la partida en la qual es la plagua sia pus auta que l’autra.	And similarly, if the disruption is in one of the two sides of the belly, then place your hand and your attention quickly on the side where the pain is higher than the other.
E ayssi cove que tu aministres aquo en las plaguas grans e en las plaguas migieras.	And thus, administer this in the severe and mild cases.
E en las plaguas petitas, pausa aquo que es a tu preparat, e aprop fay que·l ministre sia entre las tuas mas pyatados, le qual tengua la disrupcio tota am la sua ma e ajusta las labias de lu, e aprop descuebre de aquela ad aquel que siec la sutura alcuna causa aprop autra.	And in the minor cases, place what is prepared on your hand, and make sure that the minister holds the disruption completely with their hand and adjusts the lips of it, and remove one stitch at a time until you find another cause.
E aquesta es la manieyra de sutura comuna: una que prenguas la agula, o comte de agula segon la cantitat de la amplitut de la plagua; e aprop layssa de la extremitat de la disrupcio del dit anular, e strenh la agula una, otre que tu no metas fiel en las doas extremitatz de la codena, am doas extremitatz del ciphac que es dejos la codena de las partidas dedintz, entro que fassas aquela penetrar de aquela partida; e tu ja has agreguadas doas extremitatz de la codena e doas extremitatz del ciphac, e so faytas quatre ordes.	And this is the common method of suturing: you take a needle, or count the number of needles according to the size of the wound; and lay it at the end of the disruption of the said ring, and strengthen the needle one, or do not put it in the two ends of the thread that is below the skin of the parts that are inside, until you make it penetrate that part; and you have already added two ends of the thread and two ends of the silk, and make four knots.
E aprop strenh am fiel doble en le circuit de la agula, e alcunas veguadas de doas partz ensemps, e aprop agregua las doas labias e la plagua per agreguacio decent; e aprop layssa la grossitut del dit e fiqua una autra agulha en aquela, e aprop lia aquela am fiel ayssi cum fiest am la primieyra agulha; e no cesses far aquo si es necessitat am las agulhas entro que ajas complida tota la contriccio de la plagua.	Approach the double needle in the circle of the needle, and some stitches of two parts together, and then add the two lips and the wound by aggregation, and then leave the largest one and put another needle in that, and then tie that with the same thread as the first needle; and do not stop doing this until the wound is completely closed.
E sian las agulhas migieras entre groceza e subtilitat, quar las agulhas subtils mot leugierament insciden la carn; e las grossas so de dificil intrament en la codena, e donc per aquo cove que sian migieras en subtilitat e grosseza.	And the needles should be of medium thickness between coarse and fine, because fine needles penetrate the flesh more easily; and large needles are difficult to insert into the tissue, therefore it is better that they be of medium thickness.
E no cove que la agulha sia ficada en doas extremitatz de la codena propdana mot, per so que la carn no sia inscidida leugierament e que la plagua se huebra devant la sua consolidacio.	And do not let the needle be stuck in two ends of the wound intended for, because the flesh should not be penetrated too easily and the wound should heal before its consolidation.
E no sian prolonguadas de sutura per que la plagua no sia prohibida de consolidacio.	And they should not be prolonged for stitching so that the wound is not prevented from consolidating.
E aprop inscideys las extremitatz de las agulhas per so que no ledescan le malaute deves le sieu dormier; e pausaras sobre la sutura pulvils expanduts de tota partida, les quals tenguan las extremitatz de las agulhas; e layssa aquelas entro que sapias que la plagua ja es consolidada.	And then carefully insert the tips of the needles so that they do not pierce the patient's skin; and place cotton pads over the sutured parts, which hold the tips of the needles; and leave them in place until you know that the wound is healed.
E aquestas specias de sutura am agulhas en cal manieyra es pus convenient en las plaguas petitas, quar habasta en la sutura de lor una agulha o doas o entorn aquelas.	These types of stitches with needles are most suitable for small wounds, since in their suture there is usually one or two or several needles.
Mays la segonda sutura es cominal: e es que tu aministres am sutura las quatre extremitatz, de la codena e doas extremitatz del ciphac, en una veguada, am agulha en la qual sia fiel envolopat engual en subtilitat e grosseza.	The second type of stitch is similar: and you administer the four ends, two from the catgut and two from the silk, in a row, with a needle that is thin and thick enough.
E aprop quan am la agulha auras penetrat aquestas quatre extremitatz, reduzeys la agulha de aquela meteyssa partida de la qual comensest, per so que le fiel retrayt caja de la pus subirana partida a la plagua, per so que la sutura sia segon sutura de drap am la qual les draps so strengutz.	And then when the needle has penetrated these four ends, reduce the needle to the same part of the thread from which it started, so that the false knot on the wound does not rise again, so that the suture is the second type of stitch with a strong thread.
E pausa entre quascuna sutura la quantitat del gros del dit mendre.	Pause between each suture the amount of the thick of the said injury.
E aquesta sutura sabo les homes.	And this stitch is for women.
E am tal sutura yeu cozegui la plagua la qual era accidida a un home en le sieu ventre le qual era stat plaguat am un cotel, e era la disrrumpcio de la plagua major de un palm, e era eyssit dels budels entorn dos palms del budel del mieg loc e era la disrupcio en le mieg del membre; e adonc yeu reduzegui aquel depus que le budel havia stat foro la plagua per xxiiii horas.	And this stitch was used to sew the wound that occurred in a man's abdomen, which was pierced by a knife, and was a rupture of the main vein of a palm, and was located around two palms from the intestine in the middle of the member; and then he reduced it so that the intestine had been pierced for 24 hours.
E la plagua fo consolidada en le spazi de xv dias o entorn, e curegui aquel e es sanat; e aprop aquo visquec per motz ans, e es conversat en las suas disposicios.	And the wound was consolidated in the space of 15 days or so, and he treated it and it was cured; and then he applied this ointment for a while, and he continued in his positions.
E les autres metges havian jutgat que no fora sanat; e per miracle foc, quar yeu no curegui aquel am enguent, quar era en loc en le qual enguent no era atrobat ni deguna medicina, mays pausegui sobre la plagua coto viel dos veguadas lo dia e ablucio assiduo am aygua de mel entro que foc sanat.	And other doctors had thought that it would not be healed; and because of a miracle, fire, which was in a place where the wound was not treated with any medicine, but only covered over the wound for two days and frequent bathing with honey water until the fire healed.
Mays yeu diyre dos specias de sutura proprias segon narracio de Paraula.	May you direct two specific types of sutures according to the narrative of Paracelsus.
E es que tu comenses am sutura de la codena, e entrometas agulha de la partida deforo a la partida dedintz.	And if you begin with the suture of the neck, and insert the needle from the front part to the back part.
E donc cum la agulha penetra en la codena e en aquel meteys lacertz segon rectetut e en longetut de tot le cos, e layssa la extremita del ciphac en le qual has entromesa la agulha; e fay penetrar en la autra extremitat la agulha de la partida dedintz a la partida deforo en l’autra extremitat del mihat. E don cum tu auras fayta aquela penetrar, lahoras tu fay aquela penetrar autra veguada en aquela meteyssa extremitat del mihat de la partida deforo a la partida dedintz; e leyssa la extramitat del ciphac que es en aquest latz, e fay penetrar la agulha en l’autra extremitat de la partida dedintz a la partida deforo. E aprop comensa de aquest meteys costat e cus aquel am la extremitat que es del ciphac en l’autra latz, e extratz la agulha de la codena la qual penetrec, e aprop redutz aquela en aquela codena e cos la extremitat del ciphac que es en l’autra costat am aquesta extramitat del mirat; e extratz aquela de la codena la qual es de part de lu. E la suma de aquesta manieyra de sutura es que tu cozes am sutura de pellicies am la qual cozo las pels, enayssi que tu cozes le ciphac una veguada de la part de la extremitat de la codena, e que leysses aquela autra veguada entro que la ajas complida.	The advantage of this method of suturing is that you cover the wound with a piece of cloth that covers the skin, in order to keep the spine away from it for a while, and then cover it again after you have completed the other side.

The second special method of suturing, which is called Guillotine, and this is the same for both sides, and it should be recommended to you, is that you cover that second semilunar piece that doctors usually cover with another, in order to add all the parts together at the corresponding part of it, and apply the end of the other side to the end of the mirror on the other side, and this is done according to your recommendation.

When you place the needle at the end of the mirror, near your own part, and make it penetrate into that spot, and lay two ends of the thread; then rotate the needle and make it penetrate from your part to the other end of the thread.

E mays le diyssero alcus, sutura del ventre es rectificada am dos agulhas, so es que tu entrometas en aquestas a quascunas un fiel, e comensa am intromiccio de agulha de aquo que es deves tu, e fay aquela penetrar entro al autra latz segon sutura de aquels les quals cozo les cuers engualment. Mays le juguament de medicacio de plagua es jutgament de las autras plaguas.	The judgment of medicine for plague is different from that of other diseases.
La qual causa es quar quan tu consieguas la plagua recent am le sieu sanc denant que l’ayre altera aquela, e reduses le budel e cozes aquela e aptas aquela decentment, lahoras pausa sobre aquela polvera encarnativa. If you do not have the medicines with you, then place something on that garlic, vinegar, and honey, and change it twice a day, as you have been taught, until it is healed, because you do not need other medicine in cases of simple diseases when the plague is present.

If you are afraid that the plague might spread to the main members, then cover yourself with lion's wool dipped in oil of good quality, or with rose oil, and place it around the areas where the fleas live and leave them there.

E sapias que aquela que es del budel gros es de pus leugiera sanacio que aquela que es en les budels subtils.	And you should know that the pus from a large intestine is less dangerous for healing than the pus from small intestines.
E es de dificil sanacio quar le budel le qual es apelat “gegunu” no recep sanacio de plagua que caja en lu de tot; e aquo es per la gran multitut de venas que so en lu e per la magnitut de lu que so en aquelas, e per subtilitat del cos de aquel, e per propinquitat de aquel a natura de nervis. Rememoracio de las plaguas quan accideysso en le budel.	Remembrance of wounds that occur in the intestine.
Quan accideys disrupcio en le budel e es petita, lahoras es possibla que sia resteurada en alcus homes, per aysso quar yeu vi aquel le qual era stat plaguat en le sieu ventre am percussio de lansa et era la plagua de la part dreyta del stomac, e la plagua era antiquada e fayta fistula, e eyssic de lu gestio e ventositat.	When a disruption occurs in the intestine and it is small, it is possible that it can be restored in some people, because they have seen that one who was wounded in their belly by percussion of an arrow and the wound was the part of the middle of the stomach, and the wound was old and had become a fistula, and they were able to manage and vent the intestine.

And if you have not yet seen the location that has already solidified, then apply pressure over the patient's abdomen to prevent further damage; and do not attempt any treatment for this injury, but rather let them rest in their bed, eating and drinking as usual, and then proceed with the necessary treatment.
E ja diysero alcus experimentados que quan endeve plagua en le budel, e es petita, lahoras cove que sia liada segon aquesta manieyra: e es que tu prenguas fromiguas de grans caps; e aprop ajusta las doas labias de la plagua e pausa una fromigua de aquelas que aja la boca uberta sobre las doas labias de la plagua; donc quan pren sobre aquelas e strenh la sua boca, abscindeys le cap de lu, quar adhereys e no es dissolvut.	And some experienced physicians have said that when a hernia occurs in the intestine, and it is small, then you should follow this method: first, take large needles; then adjust the two lips of the hernia and place one of those needles with the open mouth over the two lips of the hernia; when you put it on them and strengthen your mouth, cut off the cap of the needle, which adheres and does not dissolve.
E aprop pausa autra formigua prop la primieyra, e no cesses aquo a far am formiguas una aprop autra segon la quantitat de tota la plagua.
